au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=12m_L2=2m_offset_apx12p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g3 driveGuide(guideConfig.g3) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g3) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 12.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -98) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 34.451) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.697)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39, 0) driveBsz(259)
